History.loginPrompt: Login to save and revisit previous chats!
History.empty: Your conversations will appear here once you start chatting!
History.reachedEnd: You have reached the end of your chat history.
History.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your chat and remove it from our servers.

MultimodalInput.stopCurrentResponseDescription: The model is still responding. Do you want to stop it and send your new prompt now?

Visibility.privateDescription: Only you can access this chat
Visibility.publicDescription: Anyone with the link can access this chat
